name: TechTalkingMinute

”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to know what your PC/Mac OS can do? How about learning to make better use of smart bulbs and conserve the energy and your money! Everything and anything that can be discussed about everyday Technology is brought under a minute.
Learn all of that with fresh tips and tricks updated every day.
Tech Talk Minute - Minute you have to subscribe to!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
